alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:28AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meade and east central Pennington Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1228 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of New Underwood, or 26 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wicksville around 1235 AM MDT. Owanka around 1240 AM MDT. Wasta around 1245 AM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 81 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
